description: A web page implementing a database visualization interface with a sidebar to select databases and tables, and a main content area to view table data in a scrollable, expandable table format. Includes client-side JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and UI interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting selection state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables belonging to a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells, handling objects, long texts, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on click to view full data.
